Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.menu

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.menu.Menu
guigame.logic.menu.MainMenu
public class MainMenu
extends Menu
Implementation of Menu: Shown when the game is initialized. From here, the game can be started and settings can be changed.

  • Field Summary

    private GUIMainMenu guiMenu

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu​(int y, StartGameEventListener l)
      Initialize a new MainMenu.
      Parameters:
      y - The y-offset for both players, where they are spawned, mostly height / 2
      l - The StartGameEventListener to be invoked on "Start Game"

  • Method Details

    • createGUIMenu

      private void createGUIMenu()
      Create a new GUIMainMenu.
      See Also:
      GUIMainMenu

    • getPlayers

      public Players getPlayers()
      Returns:
      the current players

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(int player, boolean human)
      Replace the player at the index player with either an ArtificialIntelligencePlayer or a HumanPlayer.
      Parameters:
      player - The index for the player to be replaced
      human - Whether the generated Player should be a HumanPlayer (true) or AI-Player (false)

    • getGuiMenu

      public GUIMainMenu getGuiMenu()
      Returns:
      the GUIMainMenu

    • oneHuman

      public boolean oneHuman()
      Returns:
      Whether one human or no humans are selected
